rewrite1:
Begin by adjusting the first paragraph: set the outline level to Level 5 and alter the line spacing to 1 cm.

Proceed to the tenth paragraph: assign it an Outline level of 1, introduce a 6-point space above the paragraph, align the text to the left, and apply a 1 cm hanging indent.

For the ninth paragraph: switch the font to Microsoft JhengHei, adjust the hanging indent to 6 points, update the font size to 10.5 points, and ensure that any italic formatting is removed.
